item.title: About
item.description: This Blog This blog consists of articles about programming, philosopy, and more. From deep dives to well-rounded overviews that remove mysticism, everything is easily explained in a consumable way. Every article tries to take a new point of view, to link ideas together, and to tackle topics that haven’t been before. The Author I am Chirag Wadhwa, a deliberate person tackling the world as a system of interconnected ideas and concepts.
